WidgetTable.clickOrDragToUpload: Click or Drag Files Here to Upload

importModal.importErrorContent: The imported file is encrypted or the format is incorrect. Please check and import again.

message.uploadFileFormatError: Only xls or xlsx file formats are allowed
message.errorWorkflowIdExplain: Process analysis error, please confirm the correctness of the data process configuration

customTable.title: Customize Table
customTable.tip1: Set frozen columns, which will not be affected by horizontal scrolling
customTable.tip2: Setting frozen columns to 0 means no columns are frozen
customTable.tip3: Enable frozen columns, default freeze operation column
customTable.tip4: When freezing n columns after, n does not include the operation column
customTable.tip5: When freezing n columns before, n does not include the serial number column
customTable.tip6: Columns within the header group are arranged in the order of the header group configuration
customTable.tip7: In grouped display columns, the foremost column position is the group insertion position
